PIONEERING | CATALYZE | FORESIGHT About ACM

The Association for Computing Machinery (ACM) is the worldâ€™s largest and most influential computing society, dedicated to advancing the field of computing through research, education, and collaboration. Founded in 1947, ACM connects a global community of professionals, educators, and students, providing access to top-tier research publications, conferences, and learning resources.

With its various special interest groups and local chapters, ACM fosters innovation, promotes technological advancements, and empowers individuals to shape the future of computing. Whether through networking, professional development, or groundbreaking research, ACM remains at the forefront of the digital revolution.

About SP Jain Global

SP Jain School of Global Management is a world-class business school with campuses in Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, and Sydney. Leveraging its innovative and internationally focused model of education, SP Jain offers globally competitive programs in business, management, and technology.

With a combination of experiential learning, industry experience, and multicultural insights, SP Jain prepares students to thrive in rapidly evolving global economies. With a focus on leadership, entrepreneurship, and cutting-edge technology, SP Jain continues to shape the business leaders and entrepreneurs of tomorrow.
